document_data.name: Derendil
document_data.mainbody: '''Derendil''' was a [[quaggoth]] who inhabited the [[Underdark]] during the late 1480s [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Under the influence of the [[demon lord]] [[Fraz-Urb'luu]], Derendil believed himself to be an [[elf|elven]] prince from the kingdom of [[Nelrindenvane]] in the [[High Forest]] who was polymorphed into a quaggoth by an evil [[wizard]]. Nobody could convince him that his story was false.
document_data.History: Derendil was captured by [[drow]] slavers of [[Velkynvelve]] during the late 1480s DR.
